extendedInfo.description: Roll marbles through 3D obstacle courses.  Like a cross between Labyrinth, Marble Madness, and those little puzzles with ball bearings that always drove you crazy...only with more explosions!  Includes 30 levels of devious physics based challenges, and an editor to create your own new levels.This game has been tested on Droid, Droid Incredible, and Nexus One.  I expect it to work fine on other phones too, but if you find one it doesn't work on, please tell me.Free version is ad supported.

reviews.title: This is excellent

reviews.author: Beth Eaton

reviews.title: Query on use with tab devices
reviews.comment: Acer A500 Have tried 1st few games but tilt activity seems wrong.  Hold in portrait view.  Tilting  down on the right causes ball to roll towards you.  Tilting down on the left causes ball to roll away from you.  Tilting down on the top edge causes ball to roll to right.  Tilting  down on the bottom edge causes ball to roll to left.
reviews.author: Alan Winter

reviews.title: WHY NO SUPPORT
reviews.comment: Really hating Android and heres another example.  Im on the Android Market website and theres no support at all for this app - No email or way to contact developer with questions. You all keep asking people to not write negative reviews but then you don\'t give us a way to contact you with questions.  Got through first 2 levels and then couldn\'t get anything else to work.  Since I can\'t email Mr Eastman to ask him some questions and get him to clarify things, I have to just uninstall the app and use my other labyrinth games.  Too bad.  I wish you would have provided  your email address on the Android website so we could ask you questions.  But at least maybe you can provide some more specific directions on how to play the game.  Like Level 3, It takes Two - what am I supposed to do?  And the rest of the levels also had problems as I couldn\'t figure out what I was supposed to do and tilting the phone in all sorts of directions didn\'t help.  Graphics poor on levels supposedly 3D.  No instructions on each level so very confusing Developers you need to create a good game but you also need to explain it clearly and you need to be accessible.  Uninstall. Sorry
reviews.author: A Google User
